articles.title: Ricky Ponting steps down as DC head coach - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The former Australian captain was at the helm of the franchise for seven seasons starting from 2018
articles.content:
Ponting was at Dc since 2018. © BCCI/IPL
Ricky Ponting has stepped down from his position as the head coach of Delhi Capitals, the franchise announced on X on Saturday. The former Australian captain… [+1197 chars]
